title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 20 December 2011 - XWiki
content:
03:09 <pharvey> has joined #xwiki  
03:19 <npm\_> has joined #xwiki  
03:19 <npm> has quit  
03:26 <tekzilla> has quit  
03:28 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
03:30 <pharvey> hi. Has anybody tried to figure out a mimetype for wiki markup?  
03:30 <@sdumitriu> Hi pharvey  
03:30 <@sdumitriu> Not as far as I know  
03:31 <pharvey> cool. Just making sure I wasn't missing something obvious  
03:31 <pharvey> found some ancient discussions, and lost souls on stackoverflow, but nothing firm :}  
04:29 <pharvey> I'm working towards text/x-wiki+foswiki  (or perhaps something like text/x-wiki+tml; dialect=foswiki)  
04:30 <pharvey> pretending for a second that text/wiki someday gets registered with IANA properly, does text/wiki+xwiki seem plausible to you guys?  
04:37 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
04:40 <pharvey> cool  
04:53 <pharvey> apparently socialtext intend to use text/vnd.socialtext.wiki  
06:00 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
06:03 <Denis> has quit  
08:08 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
09:15 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:42 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <vmassol> sburjan`: good morning  
09:50 <vmassol> sdumitriu: you still up?  
09:50 <@sdumitriu> Yep  
09:50 <vmassol> can you remind me what eventstreams is?  
09:51 <@sdumitriu> Future of ActivityStream  
09:51 <vmassol> so it deprecates AS?  
09:51 <@sdumitriu> Currently it's just the API, but it relies on the AS as the actual backend  
09:51 <vmassol> ah  
09:51 <@sdumitriu> Waiting for a proper storage module  
09:51 <vmassol> didn't see any dep on AS in its pom.xml  
09:52 <vmassol> it's porbably implemented as components in the AS itself  
09:52 <vmassol> so it deprecates the API part of the AS ATM?  
09:52 <vmassol> (I'll update the description in the pom.xml)  
09:52 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
09:53 <vmassol> ok thanks. And messagestream is another api on top of eventstream for sending messages?  
09:53 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
09:53 <vmassol> I'm going to propose to add a messagetsream-ui module to contain the UI part of it  
09:53 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <vmassol> since right now it's in the user ui module which isn't correct  
09:54 <vmassol> (for the user profile part)  
09:54 <@sdumitriu> Yep  
09:54 <vmassol> I don't know where is the other part, probably in the AS page itself and it should be moved out probably  
09:54 <jvdrean> has quit  
09:55 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:10 <vmassol> sdumitriu: XWikiUserNetworkSheet is part of the messagestream feature or not?  
10:11 <vmassol> the following/follower feature is part of the user profile or part of the message stream ?  
10:11 <vmassol> I'd say message stream but I'd like to be sure  
10:11 <@sdumitriu> +1 MS  
10:11 <vmassol> ok  
10:12 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <sburjan`> has quit  
10:14 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
10:24 <vmassol> mail sent, you can vote  
10:35 <jvdrean> has quit  
10:37 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <vmassol> sdumitriu: you forgot to update the roadmap page after the 3.3 release. Doing it  
10:45 <@sdumitriu> Right  
10:52 <vmassol> oops was 3.3 not 3.4  
10:52 <vmassol> nm  
10:57 <+sburjan> good morning vmassol  
10:58 <+sburjan> did you wanted to say something earlier ?  
10:58 <vmassol> sburjan: yep, just wanted to let you know that we'll need to move the use rmessage feature doc in some near future  
10:58 <vmassol> right now it's in the user app page but it should actually be in a user message app page  
10:58 <vmassol> but before we do this we need to create the user message app module + page (I've just sent a vote for that)  
10:59 <tekzilla> is now known as <bob1>  
10:59 <+sburjan> okay, I'm ready to move the content out of user app anytime  
10:59 <bob1> is now known as <bobob>  
10:59 <bobob> is now known as <bob2k>  
11:01 <bob2k> is now known as <undercoverbob>  
11:02 <+sburjan> vmassol: one question. You told me yesterday to put a nice icon for User Application so it will have a cool icon on platform features page. the only issue is that I can't find User Application on http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/WebHome  
11:05 <+sburjan> ok, found it, it was on the Enterprise Features. my mistake  
11:11 <+sburjan> done :)  
11:12 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
11:12 <vmassol> thanks  
11:27 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
12:03 <vmassol> guys just sent a mail about using the xwiki.org jira project more  
12:03 <vmassol> I'd like to do this one now "\* Modify it in JIRA so that this project doesn't have any Affects and Fix for fields. The idea is to simple have a list of issues and no releases."  
12:03 <vmassol> could some of you reply to the mail so that I can see if we're ok or not  
12:09 <+sburjan> I don't see it  
12:10 <vmassol> "[Proposal] Use the http://XWiki.org JIRA project more"  
12:11 <vmassol> hmm  
12:11 <vmassol> maybe hasn't reached the list yet  
12:12 <+sburjan> I only have 3 mails on dev today: [VOTE] about user app, [VOTE] for message/AS Stream and the one about wikiwords  
12:13 <vmassol> I don't see it on markmail either  
12:14 <+sburjan> FYI: I started testing App Within Minutes today on 3.3 final  
12:15 <vmassol> sburjan: resent  
12:15 <+sburjan> got it now  
12:19 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: Is there something that needs to be done to enable a new language for the WYSIWYG?  
12:34 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: yes, you have to list the language in https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-wysiwyg/xwiki-platform-wysiwyg-client/src/main/resources/org/xwiki/gwt/wysiwyg/Wysiwyg.gwt.xml (locale property)  
12:34 <+mflorea> or https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-gwt/xwiki-platform-gwt-user/src/main/resources/org/xwiki/gwt/user/User.gwt.xml  
12:34 <+mflorea> depends where you added the new language file  
12:34 <vmassol> link to doc on xwiki.org?  
12:34 <vmassol> :)  
12:35 <+mflorea> I remember it was documented in the release notes  
12:35 <vmassol> maybe need to be moved to a proper place?  
12:35 <vmassol> (we need to work on improving our doc)  
12:35 <vmassol> lunch time for me! bbl  
12:37 <+mflorea> documented on http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Wysiwyg/WebHome  
12:58 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
13:16 <sdumitriu> has quit  
13:17 <mflorea> has quit  
13:51 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
13:52 <vmassol> has quit  
14:09 <vmassol1> guys I'd like some help  
14:09 <vmassol1> could someone take care of updating this section: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Contributing#HFixingbugsornewFeatures2FImprovements ?  
14:17 <vmassol1> evalica1: I'm starting to be really frustrated by the new horizontal menu on chrome :(  
14:17 <vmassol1> it almost never works  
14:17 <vmassol1> it's a real pain

14:22 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki

14:37 <vmassol1> has quit  
14:38 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:52 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
15:06 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
15:07 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
15:07 <vmassol> has quit  
15:07 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
15:08 <vmassol> sburjan: do we need http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DocumentationToDo ?  
15:08 <vmassol> I'd rather we use JIRA instead  
15:12 <vmassol> removing t  
15:12 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
15:15 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
15:17 <vmassol> we really need a proper navigation panel  
15:17 <vmassol> users keep creating custom ones.. ;)

15:25 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
15:31 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
15:37 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
15:37 <+sburjan> sorry for the delay vmassol , I was in a meeting  
15:38 <+sburjan> sis you create a jira or several jiras for what was on that page you deleted ?  
15:38 <+sburjan> \*did  
15:42 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
15:42 <vmassol> sburjan: they were all marked as done  
15:44 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki

16:26 <+sburjan> vmassol: there weren't all done :)  
16:26 <vmassol> has quit  
16:26 <+sburjan> I am going to report them individually  
16:27 <vmassol1> sburjan: in jira?  
16:27 <+sburjan> yes  
16:27 <vmassol1> good  
16:35 <+sburjan> done
